title: We need your help to fight off the Roo! Plus its double points for TT =D
body:
http://i.imgur.com/kj8Nfkx.png

Join the Homeguards and help us win the server a summoner icon and the final chance to achieve the community goal!

Also help build the Twisted Treeline community so we can expand the queue in Oceania. Grab a friend and join the fight =D

replies.body: Made it with 12 minutes left - tonnes of time!
Yeah im trying man but no one plays TT :(
If only people would make TT games quick instead of stretching them out amirite

Weren't you the Nunu that was INTing?

---

I tried to end as quickly as a could, heim on your side kept playing.
Malz and panth wanted to farm and shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o0cim55M,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-02-02T12:31:13.378+0000)
>
> Weren't you the Nunu that was INTing?
> 
> ---
> 
> I tried to end as quickly as a could, heim on your side kept playing.
> Malz and panth wanted to farm and shit.

Inting is against the summoners code friend I would never commit or condone such an action

match history would suggest otherwise.

if you wanted to let the enemy win for ocean you should have just sat in fountain.
Because TT is boring (personal opinion.), and i don't actually enjoy the map.
bruh no one plays TT and my client ain't even working see y'all when we fight the final boss lol
haha I am also having client issues, both with the legacy and new client. {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o0cim55M,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-02-02T10:44:12.416+0000)
>
> haha I am also having client issues, both with the legacy and new client. {{item:3070}}

Good to know I'm not the only one, the new client just makes my launcher not want to work{{item:3070}} Not gonna get a game in now bc it took me all day to fix it

What sort of issue are you having?

Also if the old client is(/was) working, just go to

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system

Edit the User.cfg file (with notepad or something), and change it to

>leagueClientOptIn = no

This will bypass use of the beta client if it's the beta client causing the issue.
I find TT extremely boring. Dominion was way better.  So if it gets removed from the queue I wouldn't miss it.

I don't play TT, but for the sake of my nami icon i'll spam a few games. 

Been playing SR to gain points but it's so slow :-0

We did it!
